## **Bio**

Sam Kuglen is passionate about addressing how human pollutants and climate variability affect coastal ecosystems and fisheries management. She cares deeply about environmental justice and aims to be an advocate for underrepresented communities. Sam aspires to use her background in Marine Biology and Environmental Science Management to assist agencies in making informed decisions in coastal marine resource use and ecological preservation.
